website_summaries.verdict: Although it bears the same "G2" name as its big brother, the LG G2 Mini is watered down in every respect. Its screen has a disappointingly low resolution, its processor doesn't put up much of a fight and it has an 8- rather than 13-megapixel camera. Unless you crave 4G, the Motorola Moto G is a much better buy as it offers a better screen, the same processor and costs half the price.If however you're after the best mobile tech but in a more pocketable size, Sony's superb Xperia Z1 Compact is where your money should go.
pros: The LG G2 Mini is more affordable than its flagship namesake, it has good battery life and a decent camera
cons: It has a lower resolution screen than the Motorola Moto G (which costs less than half the price) and its processor doesn't provide much power

customer_reviews.title: My father liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Father in India and it's working well for him. His first smartphone, I wanted it to be android and 4G. This was in the price range, unlocked and had european bands and 3G bands that are supported in India and 4G bands that will be used in future. The phone worked flawlessly so far since May 1st, and I am sure it will in future. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone, really easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The user interface is really clean and crisp. Excellent photo quality on both front and rear facing camera. Night image quality exceptionally clear, the front facing camera gives awesome video quality while using Skype. Great with multitasking. My only concern was when i first turned on the phone there was a bunch of Chinese apps but it works like a charm. Absolutely no complaints so far in my almost 3 weeks of active use.
customer_reviews.author: Daedreen Peterkin

customer_reviews.title: play game and even use Playstation remote play and the graphics doesnt lag etc which is pretty nice,
customer_reviews.text: Soon it would make it 6 months since i have bought this phone. So far only problem is that heats up a little when gaming for 1 1/2hrs + And it restarted randomly about 3 times however no major problems came out of these. Besides whats mentioned above i download different softwares, play game and even use Playstation remote play and the graphics doesnt lag etc which is pretty nice,

customer_reviews.title: Great phone overall, though some issues with MMS texts when used on AT&T network.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great phone, especially for the price. The screen is clear and bright, and battery life is great. My only complaint is that we've had some issues with MMS texts using this phone on the AT&T GoPhone network - still working to find a consistent solution. Our previous phone with the same SIM card had no issues with MMS texts.

product_meta.title: LG G2 Mini D620R 8GB 4G LTE Unlocked GSM Android Quad-Core Smartphone - White - International Version No Warranty
product_meta.description: Take full control of your phone with your index finger and capture and store high-resolution images and videos that are crisp and clear.
feature_bullets: 4.7" IPS LCD Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 2
Android v4.4.2 (KitKat), Quad-Core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A7 Processor, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8226 Snapdragon 4, Adreno 305 Graphics
8 Megapixel Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus and LED Flash+ Front-Facing 1.3 Megapixel Camera
Internal Memory: 8GB, 1GB RAM + microSD Slot Expandable up to 32GB

specifications.Other camera features: Primary: 8 MP, 3264 x 2448 pixels, autofocus, LED flash, Features: Geo-tagging, face detection, panorama, HDR, Video: 1080p@30fps, HDR|Secondary: 1.3 MP, 720p
